titleStmt.title: Baconiana, or, Certain genuine remains of Sr. Francis Bacon, Baron of Verulam, and Viscount of St. Albans in arguments civil and moral, natural, medical, theological, and bibliographical now for the first time faithfully published ...
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Richard Chiswell ...,

notesStmt.note: "An account of all the Lord Bacon's works" (p. 1-104) signed: T.T. [i.e. Thomas Tenison, Archbishop of Canterbury].
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
Imperfect: lacks t.p. of pt. 2, "The Lord Bacon's remains, civil and moral."
